mapper.select: select memberNo, memberName from member where memberId=#{memberId}
mapper.insert:
insert into project values(project_seq.nextVal, #{memberNo}, #{projectName}, #{projectCost}, sysdate, TO_DATE(#{projectEndDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'), 0, #{projectMainImage}, #{projectStory}, 'Z', 2, #{categoryNo}, 0)
SELECT project_seq.CURRVAL FROM dual
